Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Up to 2% cash rebate on dining in Singapore. Kids play, dine and stay for free every day at Resorts World Sentosa.
Up to 5% cashback on all Grocery, Petrol (Caltex, Shell), and on Recurring Payment (eg: Internet/ Cable TV/ Mobile).
Earn 1 reward point for every S$1 spend.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Rebates will be subject to a maximum cap of S$120 per account per Quarter.
Min spending of S$800/month for 3 consecutive months in a quarter to be eligible for 5% groceries, 5% petrol, 2% dining cashback.
Accumulate spending of S$400 monthly for all 3 months in a quarter to receive 3% cashback on groceries, Petrol (Caltex, Shell) & 1% dining cashback in Singapore.

Feature.Name: Online Application Special Offer
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Select Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage as the sign up gift. 2. Sign up and submit supporting documents online.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: 2 options: 1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage worth S$335 OR 2. RedMart grocery voucher worth S$80
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage (worth S$335): Charge a minimum of S$600 within the first month of card issuance. 2. S$80 RedMart grocery voucher: Charge a minimum of S$60 within the first month of card issuance. 3. Credit card applications must be submitted between 1 Feb 2016 - 31 March 2016, and receive application approval by 15 April 2016.
